LanguageData.VGE_PilotCockpit.label: pilot cockpit
LanguageData.VGE_PilotCockpit.description: An interface that allows launching and piloting a gravjumper. It draws power directly from the grav engine.
LanguageData.VGE_PilotBridge.label: pilot bridge
LanguageData.VGE_PilotBridge.description: An interface that allows launching and piloting a gravhulk. It draws power directly from the gravhulk engine.
LanguageData.VGE_CopilotConsole.label: copilot console
LanguageData.VGE_CopilotConsole.description: An auxiliary interface that allows a copilot to assist in launching and piloting a gravship. It draws power directly from the grav engine.
